thread.title: Boy, rescuer drown in Randburg swimming pool
thread.title_full: Boy, rescuer drown in Randburg swimming pool | News24

author: news24.com
title: Boy, rescuer drown in Randburg swimming pool
text:
Johannesburg - An act of bravery ended in double tragedy in Randburg, Johannesburg, on Tuesday when a six-year-old boy and a man drowned in a swimming pool at the boy's house.
ER24 paramedics said a bystander informed them that the child had been playing outside when he a fell into the pool.
The man, who was working at the house, jumped in and tried to save the child, said ER24 spokesperson Pieter Rossouw.
"He could not swim and became unconscious in the water," he said.
